PAD_HideAndSeek.synopsis: AD played when the player finds or fails to find Oliver during hide & seek.
PAD_HideAndSeek.how_to_trigger: Choose to play with Oliver, and approach the cart at 61.609 44.256 26.425 to trigger the perception check.

AD_CreepyNoises001.synopsis: The player hears creepy noises on the path to the house haunted by a shadow family.

OliverShadow.synopsis: Dialog with Oliver, the shadow-child in the Shadowcursed Lands. Oliver wishes for the player to be his playmate, and engages in a game of hide and seek. Oliver seems to be a soul trapped by the curse for a 100 years, but the player will gradually realise over the course of the act that he is in fact a shadow version of Thaniel, the spirit of the land. Oliver possesses Thaniel's heart, and the curse cannot be lifted until it is returned. Oliver does not want to do this - he's made his own little 'family' using cursed beings in the area. If the player challenges him about Thaniel, Oliver will flee towards the town square, where a final confrontation will take place.
OliverShadow.how_to_trigger: Approach 76.337; 43.63; 39.46 and speak to Oliver (he will be invisible at first/dialogue will trigger on sight)

AD_CreepyNoises.synopsis: As the player approaches the abandoned house, they hear strange noises from inside, as if someone still lived there.
AD_CreepyNoises.how_to_trigger: Approach the house at 71.534; 44.228; 38.583 in SCL.

AD_OliverDeathScream.synopsis: Death-scream of Oliver in the Oliver's Diary booster.

PAD_HideAndSeek_0.speaker: Player
PAD_HideAndSeek_0.text: Where'd that child go? Or... whatever it is.
PAD_HideAndSeek_0.context: NodeContext: Stumped, looking for Oliver Found Oliver (a little shadow/phantom boy they're playing hide and seek with)

PAD_HideAndSeek_1.speaker: Player
PAD_HideAndSeek_1.text: There you are - come on out.
PAD_HideAndSeek_1.context: NodeContext: Found Oliver (a little shadow/phantom boy they're playing hide and seek with)

AD_CreepyNoises001_0.speaker: Object
AD_CreepyNoises001_0.text: She was no fun. All I wanted was to play.
AD_CreepyNoises001_0.context: NodeContext: Disappointed. Referring to a dead githyanki the player comes across.

OliverShadow_8.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_8.text: Not back to gloat, are you? Nobody likes a bad winner.

OliverShadow_19.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_19.text: I still think you might have tricked me. If you did - I'll figure it out.

OliverShadow_13.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_13.context: NodeContext: On alert - sensing the player means him harm

OliverShadow_82.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_82.text: You were too good for me.

OliverShadow_135.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_135.text: Let's play again - you might be able to even the score.

OliverShadow_130.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_130.text: We're done when I say we're done.

OliverShadow_34.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_34.text: Boo! I scared you - I saw it. Nobody beats me at hide and seek.
OliverShadow_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns their head left and right, sensing something. Oliver jumps up from bottom of frame, trying to jumpscare the player.

OliverShadow_104.speaker: Halsin
OliverShadow_104.text: That's him - like an echo of Thaniel, remoulded by the curse. We need him, if we're to put a stop to all of this.
OliverShadow_104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin whispers, trying to not alert OliverNodeContext: Urgent, determined. Whispered, so not to alert Oliver.

OliverShadow_29.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_29.text: *Though shrouded in shadows, the child's resemblance to Thaniel is unmistakable. This must be his dark half - warped by the curse.*

OliverShadow_122.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_122.text: I'm Oliver. I'm seven. Will you play with me?

OliverShadow_124.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_124.text: Play? This is no place for a child - if that's even what you are.

OliverShadow_148.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_148.text: Of course I am! Now are you going to play with me or not?

OliverShadow_33.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_33.text: Don't startle people like that - easy way to wind up killed by mistake.

OliverShadow_116.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_116.text: Killed? Nobody dies around here, silly. Not like that. Play with me, and you'll see for yourself.

OliverShadow_132.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_132.text: You're not what you say you are. I can sense it.

OliverShadow_77.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_77.text: I don't know what you mean. I'm just me. I have a mummy, a daddy, a pet doggy.

OliverShadow_88.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_88.text: Don't you have anyone else to play with?

OliverShadow_17.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_17.text: I have a mummy, a daddy, and a doggy. They'll be back in a while. But you're here now. And I want to play.

OliverShadow_55.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_55.text: What are your parents' names? Maybe I can find them.

OliverShadow_11.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_11.text: They don't need names. They just need to be mummy and daddy, and do what I want. Now play with me, or they'll be angry with you.

OliverShadow_59.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_59.text: *The boy doesn't like these questions - because he has no real answers. And perhaps no real family.*

OliverShadow_87.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_87.text: I know who you really are, and where you really belong. You need to reunite with Thaniel.

OliverShadow_113.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_113.text: I'm not going back. I like it here - I've made a family for myself, I get to play all the time.

OliverShadow_30.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_30.text: Like it or not, you don't belong here.

OliverShadow_109.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_109.text: Yes I do. You can't make me do anything.

OliverShadow_101.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_101.text: Don't make this harder than it needs to be.

OliverShadow_144.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_144.text: I don't want to play with you anymore.

OliverShadow_0.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_0.text: This land needs you and Thaniel together, Oliver. Nature needs you.

OliverShadow_176.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_176.text: You can't make me do anything I don't want to. I won't let you.

OliverShadow_129.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_129.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player lunges at OliverNodeContext: Alarmed/resistant

OliverShadow_170.speaker: Halsin
OliverShadow_170.text: He's fled - we need to track him down. Wherever the curse is strongest, that's where he'll go. That's where he'll feel safe.

OliverShadow_75.speaker: Karlach
OliverShadow_75.text: That little bastard - where'd he go?
OliverShadow_75.context: NodeContext: Not too mean, in a jaunty way (talking about a kid)

OliverShadow_50.speaker: Jaheira
OliverShadow_50.text: Fled back to the shadows, no doubt. Come out, boy, or this mean old Harper might get cranky.
OliverShadow_50.context: NodeContext: Weary sigh, second line calling out to the darkness at a cursed child who's growing tiresome

OliverShadow_79.speaker: Lae'zel
OliverShadow_79.text: Back to the shadows. After him, ra'stil - we need to see this through.

OliverShadow_84.speaker: Wyll
OliverShadow_84.text: He's gone - and we need to follow. He'll feel the safest where the shadows are deepest.

OliverShadow_126.speaker: Shadowheart
OliverShadow_126.text: He's scarpered. We'd better track him down - if the shadows don't stop us first.

OliverShadow_137.speaker: Gale
OliverShadow_137.text: He's scarpered - and I suppose it's up to us to find him.

OliverShadow_156.speaker: Astarion
OliverShadow_156.text: Slippery little bugger, isn't he? He'll be looking for somewhere safe - somewhere where the shadows are nice and strong.

OliverShadow_125.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_125.text: *Wherever Oliver has fled to, you have to pursue him. No doubt he will seek a place where the shadows are strongest.*

OliverShadow_158.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_158.text: You're no ordinary little boy, are you? I can sense it.

OliverShadow_121.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_121.text: I don't know what you mean. The shadows must be making your head go funny.

OliverShadow_117.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_117.text: Sorry, I don't think they're coming back. Want to come to my camp?

OliverShadow_56.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_56.text: I'm not going anywhere. I like it here. Now play with me, or else.

OliverShadow_106.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_106.text: All right. I'll hide, and you seek.

OliverShadow_175.speaker: Halsin
OliverShadow_175.text: Let's make this quick. We need to reunite him with Thaniel.
OliverShadow_175.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin whispers, trying to not alert OliverNodeContext: Urgent. Whispered.

OliverShadow_60.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_60.text: And if I don't find you?

OliverShadow_139.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_139.context: CinematicNodeContext: ShrugNodeContext: Smallest hint of menace laced into an innocent-seeming statement.

OliverShadow_65.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_65.text: I've changed my mind. You're on your own.

OliverShadow_61.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_61.context: InternalNodeContext: Shadow family appears and  combat ensues

OliverShadow_160.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_160.text: Face facts, kid. Your family's dead - and you might be too.

OliverShadow_150.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_150.text: You shouldn't be nasty. You should just do what I want. It's easier for you, that way.

OliverShadow_14.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_14.text: Have you seen another little boy around here? He's called Thaniel - he's very special.

OliverShadow_164.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_164.text: He's not special - he's nothing. You shouldn't say that name. Forget you ever heard it.

OliverShadow_38.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_38.text: Study the boy. Try to understand his true nature.

OliverShadow_66.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_66.text: *Not an ordinary child, but not a spectre either. One part of a greater whole. Something ancient. And oddly... sad?*

OliverShadow_39.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_39.text: *Something is amiss about the boy - but exactly what eludes you.*

OliverShadow_43.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_43.text: A familiar magic exudes from this boy. Try to commune with it.

OliverShadow_27.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_27.text: *Below the layers of shadow and curse, you sneak a fleeting glance of this creature's true nature.*

OliverShadow_52.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_52.text: *Too many layers of shadow and curse obscure the familiar, latent magic of the child.*

OliverShadow_108.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_108.text: The child's ki feels... uneven. At odds. Why?

OliverShadow_123.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_123.text: In a moment maybe. Have you seen another little boy? His name is Thaniel.

OliverShadow_36.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_36.text: I don't know anyone called that. Don't ask me again.
OliverShadow_36.context: NodeContext: distressed - a memory is stirring that you're trying to supress

OliverShadow_15.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_15.text: I don't have time for this.

OliverShadow_93.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_93.text: Make time. I want to play. Or else.

OliverShadow_53.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_53.text: I can play you a little song  - would you like that?

OliverShadow_172.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_172.text: Not that kind of playing, silly - I want to play a game! It'll be really fun, let me show you.

OliverShadow_174.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_174.text: Unsual magic pours from the creature. What is it?

OliverShadow_16.speaker: Player
OliverShadow_16.text: Another presence lingers near the boy. Study him, try to discern what it is.

OliverShadow_46.speaker: Narrator
OliverShadow_46.text: *Unlike your patron, the presence isn't separate. It's more part of the boy. You focus your gaze on him.*

OliverShadow_35.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_35.text: I won fair and square. There's no point in playing again - I want a challenge.

OliverShadow_31.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_31.text: Go on. Find someone else to play with.

OliverShadow_74.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_74.text: You weren't supposed to find me. You weren't supposed to win.
OliverShadow_74.context: NodeContext: More confused than angry, like the impossible has happened.

OliverShadow_152.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_152.text: Good idea - you're smarter than some playmates I've had. They always tried to leave before I was done with them.

OliverShadow_69.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_69.text: You're not my mummy or my daddy - don't tell me what to do.

OliverShadow_12.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_12.text: Let's play another game - I deserve a chance to even the score.

OliverShadow_76.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_76.text: Try to find me again - but my family will be looking for you at the same time, so don't get caught!

OliverShadow_90.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_90.context: InternalNodeContext: Shadow family appears after the dialogue and combat ensues

OliverShadow_153.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_153.text: We're finished when I say we're finished.

OliverShadow_112.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_112.text: You ruined my fun - I don't want to talk to you.

OliverShadow_119.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_119.text: Hmph. You're good at this - are you sure you didn't cheat?

OliverShadow_159.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_159.text: But I can't let you think me a bad sport. Here's your prize. You'll need it.

OliverShadow_145.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_145.context: NodeContext: On alert - sensing the player means him harm

OliverShadow_162.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_162.text: I win! I always win, in the end.

OliverShadow_1.speaker: Oliver
OliverShadow_1.text: You did better than most though, so I'll let you go. Here - second prize. You'll need it.

AD_CreepyNoises_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_CreepyNoises_0.text: Someone's coming. Someone new. Maybe they want to play.
AD_CreepyNoises_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed anticipation. Little giggle at the end.

AD_OliverDeathScream_0.speaker: Oliver
AD_OliverDeathScream_0.text: Mummy! Daddy! Betsy! No - don't leave me!
